4310170.name: Press X to Rise
4310170.description:
Game Overview

Fall. Learn. Climb again.

Someone has sent you to the bottom of the pit.
You climb not because you are chosen, but because you refuse to stay down.

Avoid the attacks of water snakes and return to where you belong.

The Climb

The pit is filled with narrow platforms, tricky gaps, and unforgiving layouts.
Every jump must be intentional. Rushing leads to failure.

Failure Matters

Falling is part of the experience.

Your audience cheers when you fall.
The bigger the fall, the louder they cheer.

Every fall earns you money.
Progress may be lost but you gain more power—or items—to climb again.

Shops & Pricing

Multiple shops appear throughout the pit.
Shops located deeper are cheaper than those higher up.

Taking greater risks and climbing higher before falling can lead to better prices later,
rewarding players who push further before retreating.

Controls

  • Jump: X (charge-based)

  • Run: Z (hold)

  • Cancel jump charge: Z

  • Interact: C

  • Menu: Tab (Needs unlock)

Control Difficulty

  • High (Default) – Slight sliding after landing

  • Medium – Landing slide reduced by half

  • Low – No landing slide

         Levels are designed assuming landing slide.
         Lower control difficulty can significantly reduce challenge.

Game Difficulty

  • Normal (Default)

  • Easy – Fewer water snakes, larger tight platforms

  • Hard – More water snakes

AI-Generated Content Disclosure

Procedural and AI-assisted tools may be used during development.
All final content is created and approved by the development team.
